attributes.action: Make this site secure using https
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to help avoid the theft of personal data and give people confidence when providing address details.

too many sites expect people to provide address details without providing a certificate and the government should know better

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make this site secure using https."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10687.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/secure-https/
